text: Lukas Schmidt (born 19 September 1988) is a German badminton player. He was a bronze medalist at the 2007 European Junior Championships in the boys' doubles event with Peter Käsbauer. Schmidt was a champions at the 2012 and 2014 Croatian International in the men's singles event. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Boys' doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !
